title: Nerfing Darius...?!?
body:
What has gotten into you, Riot? Sitting at your laptops all day jerking off to bad porn and coming up with bad ideas?
Thank you for ruining a PERFECTLY WELL TUNED champion that has been sitting on the top lane since the early days! Darius was completely fine and counterable until you guys decided to make one giant MESS of his early game! I have never screwed up so ENTIRELY before you people turned Darius into a complete %%%! So thanks for ruining mine and everyone top player's elses experience so COMPLETELY! Hope you enjoy the fruits of your wacked ass labor!
